
# (PART) Project workflow {-} 

# Introduction

Good project workflow habits can make your data life calmer and easier, save you from preventable errors, and help you more effectively explore and analyze your data. 

In this section, we'll present our entire approach to project workflow. We'll start by explaining how to setup a project and connect it to GitHub. Then, we'll go over how we organize file and keep everything up-to-date. We'll also explain how to effectively use R scripts.
